column5: I wouldn‚Äôt post the letter but that a vacation is recommended by your doctor so you can get away and unwind for a short while. I know my therapist recommends me seeing and riding my horse, which is why I‚Äôm fighting so hard to keep her. Sometimes a doctors recommendation can do wonders.

I‚Äôm in your shoes with no job and unable to work due to mental illness (depression, anxiety and panic attacks). I set up a gofundme to help me pay vet bills for my horse because of the stress it is causing me and she is a form of therapy for me. 
It sounds to me like some time away would be therapy for you. Why not talk to your therapist and get it where they are on your side. I think more people would be willing to help with a medical opinion backing you up.
I do agree your boyfriend is not helping the situation and could be making it worse since you have zero control over your life from what I can tell.
Rescues stick together and they know when someone loves them and they have a home. They are the best ‚Äúbreed‚Äù imo
What a cutie and what sweet eyes
Happiness combined with ‚Äúmare face‚Äù if I‚Äôve ever seen it lol
It won‚Äôt be jeopardy without Alex Trebek

I‚Äôm so sorry for everything going on with your baby. I know in horses cushings is easily monitored and ‚Äútreatable‚Äù but I‚Äôm not sure in dogs. I know a few people who have had cats and dogs with diabetes and it was easily controllable. I hope this helps.
Thank you for giving information on dealing with these problems. I know about cushings in horses but never heard of it in dogs. What happens? Is it controllable?
Definitely a scam by deers but at least they‚Äôre being polite about it.
Yes in so many ways YES. I‚Äôm going back into my pokeball now, adulting has not been effective.
What a beautiful picture
Omg what a difference in his face. You are a saint. Having lived in Houston those summers are brutal. Thank you for giving this sweet boy a forever home.
What a good horse I mean doggo
What type of part time job would pay enough? I‚Äôm curious for myself as it seems when I was working full time I couldn‚Äôt support myself making $17.00 an hour.

I can relate to this being a graduate with three degrees that I don‚Äôt use. A lot of people seem to live to work and not work to live. I don‚Äôt want that existence either and am not cut out to deal with the stress of most jobs. Sadly the low stress jobs just don‚Äôt pay. I wish I could tell you it gets better but to honest I‚Äôm still waiting. Maybe you will find something you love and a career you enjoy, don‚Äôt give up yet.
Favorite smell in the world
Thank you for taking in this senior. He looks absolutely precious!
I would think they would be allowed to bring their SD. Wouldn‚Äôt it be discrimination otherwise? If someone can live there with a SD I don‚Äôt see why they can‚Äôt visit with one. Just my thought.
I‚Äôve also heard they are quite loving to their keepers and can be cuddly
Good luck! You can do this!
Good luck! You can do this!
He looks like such a clown and a happy boy!

I have a letter for my PSD but I have never really been questioned about him. Usually he goes to Disney with me as I have issues with crowds and panic attacks, I‚Äôm wondering if Disney will get stricter on what dogs they let in. As far as I know a letter isn‚Äôt required to be shown for any true SD.
Glad something stopped you and I hope you have an amazing 2020. Stay strong and you got this!
Thank you for being one of the better staff/managers there during your time working there. It‚Äôs appreciated by those who follow the rules.

That is ridiculous! I think they even have a sign saying all pets must be on leash. I also feel that people with small dogs don‚Äôt think they have to follow the same rules because their dogs are ‚Äúsmall‚Äù or ‚Äútoo small to hurt anyone‚Äù. They don‚Äôt realize that their dogs could get hurt and that yes their dogs can hurt other dogs. 

My SD would have broken and wanted to play if that had happened especially without his vest on. You have a great dog and I‚Äôm sorry you had that happen to you. I agree with the other comments and speak to a manager or call corporate and say something.
Love John Snow but my money is on Geralt
I used to help out at a barn with a mare who did this, cleaning the AUTOMATIC waters was not my favorite chore
So very proud of you! You are a fighter and will keep on fighting, you got this and I hope 2020 is your best year yet.
No such thing as a foster failure just fate. I couldnt let those eyes go either (‚Äúfoster failure‚Äù of two)
Wishing you and your pack a happy New Year from me and my pack of rescues!
For the first time in a long time I am only passively suicidal and not wishing to be dead every day. I hope eventually you feel the same

What a lovely bunch of babies
What a beauty, I can‚Äôt wait to see what this foal will do!
What a good boy!!!!!! I wish mine was as on point with DPT, sometimes at home he acts like he doesn‚Äôt care :(

This is beautiful, thank you for sharing it. It helps a lot and puts things into perspective
Someone knew they were home right away :) what a love.

There are some leashes and collars out there in yellow that say things like ‚ÄúI‚Äôm nervous‚Äù or ‚Äúask to pet‚Äù. I‚Äôve also heard about tying a yellow ribbon to their leash or collar as a warning to people. If you did get a vest I would go with yellow and custom patches so your baby isn‚Äôt confused with other SD‚Äôs in training. Good luck and I hope you can socialize your baby.

She is probably trying to keep it simple. My mom doesn‚Äôt even mention my dog Logan is a service dog, she still calls him an ESA. In public I always explain he‚Äôs a service dog and what he‚Äôs for regarding panic attacks and depression.
Ouch
So you faltered, it‚Äôs okay. Today is a new day and you can start clean again. We all have setbacks; you can do this!

I get this a lot! I‚Äôm happy yet depressed all at the same time. I don‚Äôt know why I‚Äôm depressed but I am. I want to cry for no reason and just sleep all day. My mom yells at me because she feels I‚Äôm not getting better or trying to improve. She doesn‚Äôt understand how hard it is for me to just go to therapy or do the chores she wants me to do. And that sometimes taking a shower can drain my energy.
Agreeing with Big Cat were hear to listen.
I‚Äôm 33 and still fighting. I agree 2019 can go fuck itself! I hope you make it past May for your friends and family.
Congratulations!!!
Congratulations! I was around the same age when I got my first horse! Love him and hold him tight and don‚Äôt be afraid to be 7 again!
You can do this! I have faith in you
Please let me know if it does. I come here to see if I can help people because sometimes it helps me too. Curious if that‚Äôs not working like I think. You got this!
Take a breath, it sounds like a panic attack. See if you can focus on something you can see or feel.
Good for you!!!!! I hope it works!!!!
What is peripheral vision OCD?
You are something and alive
There is no none painful way sadly
See a psychiatrist and apply for disability! Make sure everyone has good notes on your mental health.
You are stronger than most for surviving this long. Keep staying strong
Why do we need 300 comment Karma to post?
I‚Äôm here if you want to chat, the urge sucks. Oddly going on here and reading peoples posts helps me overcome that urge sometimes.

My excuse if anyone saw anything on my arms was to say it was a cat or like you a bush. I‚Äôm also pretty active and at the barn or rock climbing so I can use those as excuses (except for anything in a pattern or word). Sounds like a bush might be your best bet, if there‚Äôs a lot of cuts sounds like you tripped and fell into the bush.

I try to cut in places no one would notice or that are always covered. Most of the time I‚Äôve found people don‚Äôt notice the scars but the fresh cuts. Excuse used to be that I cut my leg shaving. Now I just respond with I cut myself and go from there. Sometimes people ask more questions and sometimes they leave it alone.

For yourself. Trying for another person rarely works. I‚Äôve been clean for about a month maybe a little longer and the urge is back again. I‚Äôm trying hard to resist for myself, to not give someone that power over me.
I know the urge well, I‚Äôm glad you were too weak to hurt yourself. Hitting the vein may not be enough to see a problem but may be enough to land you in a hospital.

No you‚Äôre not, you‚Äôre human. Tomorrow is another day and you can start fresh. The promise they asked wasn‚Äôt fair to begin with. You made progress and had a minor setback, that‚Äôs okay. Wake up tomorrow and start new.

Try as hard as you can to resist. It‚Äôs almost impossible to stop fully once you start, remission happens but urges still come. You are strong to have noticed the want and fought it. Keep fighting it, post, vent, talk to a friend, message someone on here who understands. You can do this!
You and me both! Heart attack for the win
I feed zignature too and was shocked to see it on list. Now it‚Äôs time for a change.

I come here too so I don‚Äôt feel alone. I have no real friends anymore and the ones I had I‚Äôve pushed away for the most part. The one thing I can say to try is rock climbing, you meet people and get social interaction. Some days it helps and some days like today it doesn‚Äôt.
I wish I could say to keep fighting or there was something to fight for but right now I commiserate with you.

It‚Äôs a weird thing to think about, I know I‚Äôve been like this since at least late high school/ early college. Not sure if I was before that but I can‚Äôt remember much feeling wise from before then.
I hate Florida, it‚Äôs where I am now. Sadly starting over requires money. I don‚Äôt want to start over though I just want to get away so people here stop caring.
I hate Florida, it‚Äôs where I am now. Sadly starting over requires money. I don‚Äôt want to start over though I just want to get away so people here stop caring.
I‚Äôm sorry that happened, you likely will be placed on a psychiatric hold if nothing else. I hope they are able to get you some type of help.

I was trying to help a 15 year old at one point who was in a similar situation, based on what you‚Äôve described. Different problems but her father wouldn‚Äôt take her to see a psychiatrist either. Her mother has early onset Alzheimer‚Äôs which I personally think caused some issues, on top of being adopted. In the end after three DCF calls she was baker acted. I saw her that night for the last time. I didn‚Äôt make the final DCF call, but in a way I‚Äôm glad she was baker acted, it allowed her to see a psychiatrist which in my opinion she needed. I miss her daily, love her and hope she got the help she needed. 
While I know it‚Äôs scary and no one wants to do it, a psychiatric hospital may be the only way to see a psychiatrist and get a diagnosis. I‚Äôm not gonna say it‚Äôs fun or a pleasant place. I‚Äôve never been but know a few people who have been. It‚Äôs a hard choice but it may be your only chance if your parents won‚Äôt take you.

Botched attempts suck and especially with pills they can have long lasting side effects. Be grateful your body threw it up, mine didn‚Äôt. It‚Äôs okay to feel disassociated and in a haze for a bit, especially if you have a problem that already causes it. 
Get what you mean about the being happy thing. Hopefully one day you can find it. I keep hearing people say that you have to love yourself first and be happy with yourself first.... I don‚Äôt think they realize how hard it is. I wish you the best of luck and if things don‚Äôt improve it might be time to tell someone and get treatment at least for the possible OD.
It‚Äôs weird when you realize how long you‚Äôve felt that way. And even more weird that you think about how long you‚Äôve been living in a personal hell. I‚Äôm at about 15 years now.
